kindred.network

Class ServerThread

  • Object
    • Thread
      • kindred.network.ServerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

     class ServerThread
extends Thread
    Runs as a Server thread for a connected Client, being responsible for exchanging data with the user.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class Thread

        Thread.State, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String addr
      Client's IP and port address, stored as "IP:Port".
      private static ConcurrentHashMap<Socket,ConcurrentLinkedQueue<String>> clientQueue
      Thread-safe HashMap that stores a thread-safe message queue for each Client socket.
      private static Vector<Room> currentGames
      Thread-safe Vector that stores Rooms of all games currently being played.
      private static ConcurrentHashMap<String,String> hostRooms
      Thread-safe HashMap that stores the nicknames of Clients that are hosting a room, and the name of the map they wish to play on.
      private String nick
      Client's nickname, equals null if not yet defined.
      private static ConcurrentHashMap<String,Socket> nicksToSocks
      Thread-safe HashMap that stores Client nicknames and their socket.
      private boolean quitServer
      If true, then the socket connected to the Client will close the connection to the Server.
      private Socket socket
      Client's socket that is connected to the Server.

    • Field Detail

      • socket

        private Socket socket
        Client's socket that is connected to the Server.

      • addr

        private final String addr
        Client's IP and port address, stored as "IP:Port".

      • nick

        private String nick
        Client's nickname, equals null if not yet defined.

      • quitServer

        private boolean quitServer
        If true, then the socket connected to the Client will close the connection to the Server.

      • clientQueue

        private static ConcurrentHashMap<Socket,ConcurrentLinkedQueue<String>> clientQueue
        Thread-safe HashMap that stores a thread-safe message queue for each Client socket. The queue is used to send messages to Clients in a controlled fashion. Shared among all threads.

      • nicksToSocks

        private static ConcurrentHashMap<String,Socket> nicksToSocks
        Thread-safe HashMap that stores Client nicknames and their socket. Shared among all threads.

      • hostRooms

        private static ConcurrentHashMap<String,String> hostRooms
        Thread-safe HashMap that stores the nicknames of Clients that are hosting a room, and the name of the map they wish to play on. Shared among all threads.

      • currentGames

        private static Vector<Room> currentGames
        Thread-safe Vector that stores Rooms of all games currently being played. Shared among all threads.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerThread

        public ServerThread(Socket socket)
        Constructs a ServerThread.
        Parameters:
        socket - socket connected to the Client

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run by a thread. Loop that reads data sent by the Client and responds according the message queue.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class Thread

      • parse

        private void parse(String message)
        Parses a given message sent by the Client, putting a response on their message queue.
        Parameters:
        message - message, received from the Client, to be parsed

      • queueMessage

        private void queueMessage(Socket socket,
                ServerToClientMessage msg)
        Inserts a message in the queue of the corresponding socket which will receive it. Escapes backslashes and newline characters in the message.
        Parameters:
        socket - Client's socket whose message queue will receive the message to be sent
        msg - message to be queued
